FuncDef: The display virtual-access ap-interface command displays AP interface information on a master.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays interface information on a specified AP.
The value is an integer ranging from 1024 to 8191.

Examples: APID   APAdminIP      Interface             IfIndex          State    Type
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After establishing a port extension system, you can run the display virtual-access ap-interface command to view AP interface information on a master.
If no parameter is specified, information about all interfaces on all APs is displayed.
Prerequisites
Enable global port extension.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
